detectors.description: IToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#264-276) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:IToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#268)

DSMath.mul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#541-543) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(y == 0 || (z = x * y) / y == x) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#542)
detectors.markdown:
[DSMath.mul(uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#L541-L543) uses a dangerous strict equality:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in TokenRefund._claim(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#664-685):
	External calls:
	- IToken(token).universalTransferFrom(account,address(this),amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#678)
	- IToken(address(0x0)).universalTransfer(account,ethAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#680)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Claimed(index,account,amount,ethAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#682)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [TokenRefund._claim(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32[])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#L664-L685):
	External calls:
	- [IToken(token).universalTransferFrom(account,address(this),amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#L678)
	- [IToken(address(0x0)).universalTransfer(account,ethAmount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#L680)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Claimed(index,account,amount,ethAmount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#L682)

detectors.description:

detectors.description:
changeOwner(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.changeOwner(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#27-29)

setUnlockedTime(uint256) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.setUnlockedTime(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#31-34)

acceptOwner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.acceptOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#36-39)

withdrawAll(address[]) should be declared external:
	- FundsMgr.withdrawAll(address[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#423-427)

setTokenPrice(uint256) should be declared external:
	- TokenRefund.setTokenPrice(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenRefund.sol#656-659)
